Localization.repositoryHomeDescription: Repository root directory where tomcat user has read and write access. The application will automatically append the 'deployName' property (see ergorr.properties file customized before deploying the catalogue) to this path. So if you have multiple instance of the registry then it will place the repository items of different instances in seperate subfolders.
Localization.serviceProviderNameDescription: Name of the provider hosting this catalogue
Localization.serviceProviderwebSiteDescription: URL of the website of the Service Provider
Localization.concatPhoneNumberDescription: Phone number of the contact person.
Localization.deliveryPointAddressDescription: Address of the deivery point (Road only).
Localization.deliveryPointAADescription: Administrative area of the deivery point.
Localization.deliveryPointPPDescription: Postal code of the deivery point.
Localization.concatPersonEmailDescription: Email address of the contact person.
Localization.concatPersonHSDescription: Hours of service of the contact person.
Localization.concatInstructionsDescription: Specific instructions for contacting catalogue responsible persons.
Localization.encodingDescription: Encoding used for SOAP messages exchange.
Localization.languageDescription: Language for RIM names and descriptions.
Localization.exSoapMessagesDescription: If checked ebRR will returns a detailed description of exceptions in SOAP messages.
Localization.maxRecordsDescription: This fields allows to set the maximum number of records to be returned by the catalogue. This value is checked against the maxRecords field in GetRecords operations and the lowest one is used effectively.
Localization.resultDepthDescription: The depth of the relationships in a response.
Localization.simplifyModelDescription: Great for performance improvement. usually the elements such as Slot, ExternalIdentifier, Classification, Name, Description, VersionInfo of objects such as Associations, Classifications and ExternalIdentifiers are never used (although allowed in the specification). If checked, this setting will cause the persistence layer to skip those queries for those elements for the certain objects.
Localization.loadPMLabelDescription: If checked also loads the member objects of a RegistryPackage.
Localization.loadClassificationNodesDescription: If set to 'true', loads child ClassificationNodes of ClassificationSchemes and ClassificationNodes.
Localization.returnResultsCountDescription: If not checked, good for performance as the implementation doesn't have to make a seperate query for counting. The downside is that the client will not be able to get the total result count to do things like pagination. An alternative for the client can be to fetch (requestedObjectSize + 1) to know if there is atleast one more page. NOTE: this has to be implemented yet and has to effect at the moment.
